data.description:
## Problem
Dashboard VELOCITY METRICS always shows 0 for:
- Completed Today: 0
- Completed This Week: 0
- Avg Completion Time: 0.0s

## Root Cause
In scripts/got_dashboard.py lines 258-259, get_velocity_metrics() looks for:
  completed_at_str = task.metadata.get("completed_at") or task.properties.get("completed_at")

But tasks never have completed_at set when marked complete.

## Evidence
Completed task T-20251222-114101-52ea333f:
- status: completed
- metadata: {'created_at': ..., 'updated_at': ...}
- completed_at in props: None

## Solution
In TransactionalGoTAdapter.complete_task() or TxGoTManager.complete_task():
Add completed_at timestamp to task properties when status changes to "completed"

## Files to Check
- scripts/got_utils.py: TransactionalGoTAdapter.complete_task()
- cortical/got/api.py: GoTManager task completion methods
- Look for update_task or complete_task implementations

## Additional Notes
- Also consider adding started_at when status changes to in_progress
- This enables accurate cycle time calculations
- Consider using metadata vs properties for consistency
data.title: Fix velocity metrics showing 0 - missing completed_at timestamp
